feed.title: [BIP draft] CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY - Prevent a txout from being spent until an expiration time

entry.title: [BIP draft] CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY - Prevent a txout from being spent until an expiration time
entry.summary: The context provided is a message from Gavin Andresen regarding the roll-out of a proposal. He suggests deferring the discussion about how to implement the proposal and instead focuses on determining if there is a consensus that the benefits outweigh the risks and agreeing on the exact semantics. Afterwards, they can have a more in-depth argument about whether it should be rolled out as a soft fork or wait for a hard fork, and consider other changes that could be made. Overall, the message appears to be supportive of the proposal but emphasizes the importance of carefully considering its implementation.
